original_text:
By this, then, will Jacob’s guilt be atoned for,
    and this will be the full fruit of the removal of his sin:
When he makes all the altar stones
    to be like limestone crushed to pieces,
no Asherah poles or incense altars
    will be left standing.
korean_text: 야곱의 불의가 속함을 얻으며 그의 죄 없이함을 받을 결과는 이로 말미암나니 곧 그가 제단의 모든 돌을 부서진 횟돌 같게 하며 아세라와 태양상이 다시 서지 못하게 함에 있는 것이라

sentences.original_text: By this, then, will Jacob's guilt be atoned for,
and this will be the full fruit of the removal of his sin:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 그의 죄 제거의 온전한 열매가 될 것이니라

sentences.original_text: When he makes all the altar stones
to be like limestone crushed to pieces,
no Asherah poles or incense altars
